name: Turtleback Township
description:
Alternative name: Tortle Engines

it's about building a town on a giant sea turtle. It's not done, however, but stayed tuned! I've got big/medium plans for this game!

The music is from my other game, Quadruple Helicopter Friendship! - i hope to give this game its own soundtrack, and add some music-related mechanics.
you can @ me on twitter to make sure i remember to finish this :Y

***** CONTROLS!! *****
Left Click to place stuff
Right Click+drag to move camera
Scroll to cycle through place-able objects
